Oh jeez, not the guards...
Hey, Rose, why doesn’t sir Arron like the guards?
It's probably since they mostly had to keep him in place.
Far from it, but you can also count that.
Halt. Where are you going?
Can we go in?
Hmmm... Are you a citizen?
No. We are sorta on a delivery here?
I don't trust you. The city is off-limits if you aren’t a citizen.
We don't need a new group of beggars on the streets.
You gotta be shitting me. Do I look like a beggar?
no pass.
Listen, guard...
I have a name, and it's Carl.
Listen, Carl, we really need to go in, how can we prove we aren't beggars?
Hmph. Perhaps a small payment of 10,000 gold will prove it. For each person.
YOU FU...
Wait, Sir Carl, we really need to get inside. Could you please consider some other way? We are willing to do anything!
Heh... Anything you say?
.....Except that.
Hmph.
Fine, there's been a lot of reports about bloodthirsty dwarves coming out from nearby caves.
If you take care of them, I will consider allowing you to pass.
Sigh.. let's just get on with it.
Now you see why I hate guards, Ember.
Now that you mention it, I can relate.
Maybe we could let Erika please him though.
Boo. Like I would cheat on Arron like that.
